events.content: Consolidated MCP and SDK to eliminate code duplication. Moved socket discovery and error classes to shared utils package. raw.question: Consolidated MCP and SDK to eliminate code duplication. Moved socket discovery and error classes to shared utils package. Achieved 560 line reduction with full backwards compatibility.
raw.chosen: Consolidated MCP and SDK to eliminate code duplication. Moved socket discovery and error classes to shared utils package. Achieved 560 line reduction with full backwards compatibility.
raw.reasoning: To establish a single source of truth for core functionalities like socket discovery and error handling, reducing maintenance overhead and ensuring consistency across the SDK and MCP packages.

retrospective.summary: MCP/SDK consolidation: moved socket discovery and error classes to utils, eliminated ~560 lines of duplication, 358 tests passing
